title: Heroku has been running a second copy of my scheduler instance
dot: digraph MusicButlerIssue{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box];A[label="MusicButler App" shape=ellipse];B[label="First Web-App" shape=box];C[label="Notifies users about new music" shape=box];D[label="Built with Django & Celery" shape=box];E[label="Launched in August 2018" shape=box];F[label="April 8: Duplicate Emails Received" shape=box];G[label="Celerybeat sending tasks twice" shape=box];H[label="April 12: User Complaints" shape=box];I[label="Celery Once library used" shape=box];J[label="Logs show all tasks dispatched twice" shape=box];K[label="April 6: Deployment of new build" shape=box];L[label="Renamed dyno to celerybeatnew" shape=box];M[label="Heroku spun up duplicate celerybeat dyno" shape=box];N[label="Old dyno still running (Zombie dyno)" shape=box];O[label="Implement Truly Idempotent Tasks" shape=box];P[label="Avoid Vendor Lock" shape=box];Q[label="Heroku running 2nd scheduler instance since April 6" shape=box];R[label="All tasks executed twice, causing user disturbances" shape=box];A->B;A->C;A->D;A->E; F->G;F->H;H->I; J->K;K->L; L->M;M->N;N->O;N->P;R->Q;}
